item.title: CVE-2024-32538|2024-04-17T08:37:39.647Z -- Joshua Eldridge -- Easy CountDowner
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Joshua Eldridge Easy CountDowner allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy CountDowner: from n/a through 1.0.8.
